summary:
This mod adds earthquake events during the game.
It's customizable and it have sound and visual effects.
Also this mod is safe and it's compatible with any mod!
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/32288-1-1361666926.png[/img][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/center]

[color=yellow]* OVERVIEW *[/color]

This mod adds earthquake events during the game. It's customizable and it have sound and visual effects.
Also this mod is safe and it's compatible with any mod!

[center][size=5]FULLY COMPATIBLE WITH OFFICIAL DLCs
and it's a perfect "must have" for who have the Dragonborn DLC[/size][/center]

[center][youtube]SrupX-9QTmY[/youtube][youtube]lBAQ18YII9I[/youtube]
[youtube]Haekt-pEOb0[/youtube][youtube]91ZL-TLrPec[/youtube][/center]

[color=yellow]* HOW IT WORKS *[/color]

According to basic setting you have 5% chance of an earthquake event with random duration and intensity, cycling every 120 seconds. Based on a quest scene build it is customizable via console.
All the standing NPCs around you will be staggered and you'll cower. You can jump during the earthquakes.
The dragons are immune to the earthquake effects.

[color=yellow]* MOD CONFIGURATION MENU (MCM) AVAILABLE *[/color]

[color=yellow]* COMMANDS CONSOLE FOR CUSTOMIZATION *[/color]

[color=cyan]set eq_Percentage to X.X[/color]
where X.X is a float number to set between 0.0 and 100.0. This value means the probability if an earthquake will happen.
100.0 means an earthquake strikes everytime the quest scene starts. Otherwise 0.0 it means the earthquake is never gonna happen.

[color=cyan]set eq_Timing to Y.Y[/color]
where Y.Y is a float number to set a minimum vaule of 60.0. This value sets the "pause" between quest scenes.

In either commands, please make sure to NEVER use integer numbers, so:
set eq_Percentage to 50 -> Incorrect
set eq_Percentage to 50.0 -> Correct

[color=cyan]setStage mannyEQ 100[/color]
This command shows the actual settings. It pauses the game showing a messagebox with the settings values.
To continue, getting back ingame just click the "Ok" button.

[color=cyan]setStage mannyEQ 255[/color]
This command generates an instant earthquake. Useful for demo purpose.

[color=yellow]* INSTALLATION *[/color]
NMM or, if you use manual installation, just place the ESP and BSA file and activate it via menu launcher.

[color=yellow]* UNINSTALLATION *[/color]
A correct way to uninstall the mod is to do this:

- Open console command and type: stopQuest MannyEQ
- Wait for at least the same seconds as the eq_Timing parameter (default is 2 minutes) so check your clock or kill a dragon meanwhile
- Create a new savegame
- Exit Skyrim, disable my mod.
- Reload the savegame and make a brand new one.
- Exit Skyrim, relaunch Skyrim then continue playing your latest savegame.

[color=yellow]* BUGS *[/color]
This mod is totally compatible with every mods including environmental and gameplay mods like RCRN, CoT, Frostfall, Wet & Cold, etc.
If you find any bug RELATED TO MY MOD, please report it.

[color=cyan]* FACEBOOK *[/color]
You can find me on facebook at [url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods]https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods[/url]
Join me!

* ENJOY *
author: MannyGT

files.name: Earthquakes
files.changelogHtml:
The dragons now are immune to earthquakes
The player will cower during earthquake. You can jump during this time.

files.name: Earthquakes - With moving object
files.changelogHtml: Now all items with Havok behavior will move during earthquakes. More realistic!

files.name: Earthquakes - MCM Version - With moving object
